nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader is the umbrella name for a series of five-issue comic book miniseries published by Dark Horse Comics that focus on the Sith Lord Darth Vader. The first two miniseries, Darth Vader and the Lost Command and Darth Vader and the Ghost Prison, were written by W. Haden Blackman, while the two most recent series, Darth Vader and the Ninth Assassin and Darth Vader and the Cry of Shadows, are written by Tim Siedell. Each miniseries has featured different pencillers, colorists, inkers, and cover artists, and they have each been released in hardcover collections. All four series take place shortly after the events of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.
